page.title: 04THE PARISH COUNCIL.
page.content:
{BRECKLAND DISTRICT COUNCIL}GIVE MONEY TO THE{PARISH COUNCIL.}THEY RECIVE ONE PENNY TO THE POUND FROM RATES WHICH COMES TO{Â£937.00}A YEAR.
THEY SPEND MONEY ON THINGS LIKE STREET LIGHTING,BUS SHELTER,THE NEW PAVILION. THEY DONATE MONEY TO THE VILLAGE HALL. THEY USE MONEY FOR KEEPING THE VILLAGE GREEN NEAR THE CHAPEL TIDY AND THEY ALSO GIVE MONEY TO THE CHURCHES FOR THE UPKEEP OF THE CHURCHYARDS. LAST YEAR THEY GAVE SOME MONEY TO REPAIR THE MOWER FOR THE FOOTBALL FIELD.
THEY ARE PLANNING TO PUT SOME MORE STREET LIGHTING IN CHAPEL STREET.THEY PROBABLY WILL NOT BE ABLE TO SPEND ANY MORE MONEY ON LIGHTING FOR THEY WILL HAVE TO SPEND THE REST ON ELECTRICITY.
